Author: ralph
Content: If you had to reimplement in C then it suggests that whatever non-C language the original was in, e.g. Python, you would have had to re-write it in C.  Otherwise, you would have had the choice to reimplement your Lisp in a more suitable language than C that was acceptable.  Lisp here seems a side issue.

Author: rms
Content:
CRV Quickstart is great if you're a bit further along than the idea stage.

Author: mattculbreth
Content: Yes, I pay for COBRA to continue insurance from my previous employer.  Expensive but it's good insurance.
